docs.lead_paragraph: Slope of grain is a common term among wood experts. It is unknown among most baseball fans. But the wood terminology intersected with the baseball world on Tuesday when Major League Baseball explained why it believed so many bats broke last season and how it will try to address the problem. After collecting and analyzing 2,232 broken bats from two months of games, M.L.B. and the players' union have adopted nine recommendations from baseball's Safety and Health Advisory Committee. The recommendations require manufacturers to produce better, safer bats and will be implemented for the 2009 season.

headline.main: New Bats to Undergo Testing for Quality Control

docs.snippet: Slope of grain is a common term among wood experts. It is unknown among most baseball fans. But the wood terminology intersected with the baseball world on Tuesday when Major League Baseball explained why it believed so many bats broke last season...

docs.lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS - After collecting and analyzing 2,232 bats broken during games last season, Major League Baseball and the Players Association have accepted the nine recommendations made by the Safety and Health Advisory Committee to combat the rise in broken bats. The recommendations will be implemented for the 2009 season.
docs.abstract: M.L.B. and the players' union agree to accept safety recommendations regarding broken bats.
docs.snippet: M.L.B. and the players' union agree to accept safety recommendations regarding broken bats.

docs.lead_paragraph: Credit Suisse, in the historic Met Life Building, is a working bicyclist's nirvana. It has secure bicycle rooms where employees can register their bicycles and receive swipe-card access and identification tags. The company offers air pumps to fill flat tires, and discounts for the health club next door, where showers and locker rooms are available.

headline.main: Two Wheels at the Office, Still Rare

docs.abstract: The City Council is wrestling with issue of importance to bicycle commuting -- whether to mandate that office buildings provide bike parking.
docs.snippet: The City Council is wrestling with issue of importance to bicycle commuting -- whether to mandate that office buildings provide bike parking.

docs.lead_paragraph: Few subjects have generated more interest here than long-term care insurance. And I've found myself both alarmed and amazed at how many of you think that such a policy is the all-purpose solution to exorbitantly expensive nursing homes, assisted living facilities, home health aides and other forms of "custodial care'' for the frail, demented or otherwise incapacitated elderly.

headline.main: More Reasons to Beware L.T.C. Insurance
